info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 12:21PM EDT until April 9 at 4:30AM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
Mississinewa River near Marion affecting Grant, Wabash and Miami Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Salamonie River below Warren affecting Huntington, Wells, Blackford, Jay and Wabash Counties.
Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...
Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County.
For the Mississinewa River...including Marion...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Salamonie River...including Warren, Portland...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wabash River...including Linn Grove, Bluffton IN, Wabash, Logansport...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Wabash River near Bluffton IN.
* WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, River Road at Bluffton begins to flood. Flood waters isolate the amphitheater at Kehoe Park in Bluffton.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM EDT Sunday was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 130 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
